description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1a. Physical description: 22 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Spaces left for rubrication not filled in. Catchwords. Mild insect damage. Two letters are among the inserts. Origin: Part of the same set as Islamic Manuscripts, New Series no. 767, which was completed in 1820.
author: Muḥaqqiq al-Thānī, ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥusayn, 1463 or 1464-1533 or 1534
abstract: Volume 4 of a commentary on Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī's Qawāʻid al-aḥkām fī maʻrifat al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām; contains Kitāb al-iqrār through Kitāb al-waṣāyā. Part of the same set as Islamic Manuscripts, New Series no. 767. One of the volumes is numbered incorrectly, as this volume (4) precedes no. 767 (marked 3).
extent: 189 leaves : paper ; 281 x 176 (179 x 107) mm bound to 282 x 178 mm

title.@value: المجلد الرابع من شرح قواعد الاحكام.
al-Mujallad al-rābiʻ min Sharḥ Qawāʻid al-aḥkām.

uniform_title: Jāmiʻ al-maqāṣid fī sharḥ al-Qawāʻid. Mujallad 4
جامع المقاصد في شرح القواعد. مجلد 4
provenance: On leaf 1a: Note and stamp of Mīrzā Muḥammad Mahdī al-Tabrīzī, dated 29 Shawwāl 1235 H [9 August 1820]; stamp also present on leaves 1b, 187b. Note dated 1271 H [1854 or 1855].
creator: Muḥaqqiq al-Thānī, ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥusayn, 1463 or 1464-1533 or 1534
محقق الثاني، علي بن الحسين، 1463 or 1464-1533 or 1534
subject: Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī, al-Ḥasan ibn Yūsuf, 1250-1325—Qawāʻid al-aḥkām fī maʻrifat al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām.
binding_note: Full black leather with blind-stamped fillets; brown leather doublures.
call_number: Oversize Islamic Manuscripts, New Series no. 766q
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
